ensg.tsi.majortom

Class Georeferencer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ensg.tsi.majortom.Georeferencer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineGeoreferencer, PointGeoreferencer, PolygonGeoreferencer

    public abstract class Georeferencer
extends Object
    Abstract class for all types of georeferencer (points, lines, polygons). This class is where the transformation is really applied to the input layer.
    Author:
    formation

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Context context
      The context of the transformation : input layer, output directory and name, GCPs and check points.
      private TransformationFactory transfoFactory
      The transformation factory, that will create the transformation according to the chosen type.

        public Context getContext()

        public TransformationFactory getTransfoFactory()

        Returns:
        the transformation factory.

      • setContext

        public void setContext(String inputPath,
                       String outputPath,
                       String outputName)
                throws IOException
        Method to set the context of transformation (input layer, output directory and name).
        Parameters:
        inputPath - The path of the shapefile to georeference.
        outputPath - The directory where the output layer should be written.
        outputName - The name of the georeferenced shapefile.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • applyTransfo

        public abstract void applyTransfo(TypeTransfo type)
        Method to apply the transformation to the context. This does the real work. Calls the transformation factory, creates the transformation, set the parameters using GCPs, apply the parameters to the features, and generates a report with the results (parameters, residuals, accuracy).
        Parameters:
        type - The type of transformation to apply.
